name: Sunday School Teachers
description: A group for coordinating Sunday school activities, sharing lesson plans, and supporting one another in teaching the young generation.

name: Bible Study Group
description: A group for organizing Bible study sessions, sharing devotionals, and diving deeper into scripture.

name: Youth Ministry
description: A group dedicated to the youth ministry, discussing events, youth programs, and how to engage young members.

name: Worship Team
description: A group for worship leaders, choir members, and musicians to organize worship sessions and share music resources.

name: Prayer Warriors
description: A group for dedicated prayer warriors to share prayer requests, hold prayer meetings, and encourage intercessory prayers.
